recipesJson.name: Honeycomb Custard
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
The OG Honeycomb custard!

Thick creamy custard smashed with honeycomb throughout, not one person who has tried this mix to date has given negative critisicm.

Fairly explanatory use of concentrates, 

VTA honeycomb has to be here and it has to be bold, 6% I find is the perfect amount as itâ€™s not too much and itâ€™s not too little, the warm custard, cap V1 and the sugar cookie make up the custard base and I really wanted a tinned custard here and thatâ€™s what I got because of how milky the VTA warm custard is, donâ€™t be scared by the sugar cookie itâ€™s in there as a thickener and you will not taste it apart from a nice sweet finish at the end that adds to the cinder toffee. The Creme BrÃ»lÃ©e  showcases how I go about mixing, that caramelized sugar on top accents the honeycomb perfect and the custard base boosts the base just a little bit more. This part of the description was added 30/01/19, when I mix I sometimes just go head first into it and not explain my use of concentrates and I didnâ€™t understand how badly other mixers like to know the reasoning behind the choice of flavours, I have gotten better and I hope other mixers can take something away from my recipes.

Created by myself, Nevans.

Get the one-shot now at chefs flavours.

https://www.chefsflavours.co.uk/nick-n-mix-one-shots/6626-honeycomb-custard.html

reviews.text: This gem is unique. Stands out from all of the other conventional custards... a very very nice job, Nick!
It is as good as Nick says it is!
excellent !!! A++++ so far at a 10 day steep, love this mix! GREAT JOB! now to mix up 100ml bottle to steep for the month.
Fanfuqntastic of the Shake, I canâ€™t wait for the results after itâ€™s had itâ€™s Nap
Don't even think about it. Just mix it. I have another batch steeping ready for New Year's Day.

best custard i've tried so far ,even after a shake and vape.CAP Vanilla custard for me normally is too much above 3% but in this recipe the fairly high percentage doesn't bother me.cant't wait how this turns out after a steep.nice job!
Can't believe nobody has reviewed this yet. I'm on my 2nd batch of this. I alternate between my honeycomb custard & yours. Both very good in different ways. Excellent, tasty, creamy custard ðŸ˜‹
